lyrics: View lyrics from internet with offline access after
cover: Use convenient search of covers from internet or trust it for the player
tag: Put names in order with help of the handy tag editor
flac: In addition to popular audio formats, FLAC, MP3, CUE, APE, M4A and others are supported.
watch: Control music from your watches, pick a track, all without taking a phone out of a pocket!
timer: Set sleep timer for certain amount of tracks or minutes
settings: Huge amount of settings, like list animation or lock screen
controls: Change appearance of widgets and notifications
headphones: Switch track with help of a headset, shake the phone or by volume buttons

page.vkDescription:
Stellio is one of the best music players for the social network VKontakte. All music collection is available again without any restrictions.

With Stellio you will get simple and fast access to your audios. Enjoy your favorite tracks, new tracks and personal recommendations!

Possibilities with gives Stellio Music:
  • Save music for offline listening
  • Create playlists
  • Wide music collection
  • Convenient and functional player with an equalizer
  • Albums of artists and author's collections, which can be found in official groups of artists
  • Personal recommendations
  • Extended search
  • Collection of music of your friends and communities
  • Broadcast music to status of your profile

Download the .APK plug-in from our site for VK integration:

themes.title: ä¸»é¢˜
themes.description:
The power of the player is packed in the most convenient interface. We pay special attention to design â€” every detail is well thought through. Out unique feature is changing color of elements to match the cover of a track for deeper immersion in music atmosphere. Exactly because of it the chameleon is on the icon of Stellio.

For those want more than standard appearance, there's ability to pick different interface among additional themes, which not simple change color, but completely reincarnate appearance of the player!

thegrand.short_description: Theme in gorgeous snow tones for Stellio Player with a counter of listened tracks
thegrand.full_description:
Features:
â€“ Counter of listened time
â€“ Counter of listened tracks
â€“ Switching tracks from the list with a swipe

exoblur.short_description: Premium Theme with graceful visualizer on the main screen and elegant blur
exoblur.full_description:
Features:
â€“ Visualizer on the main screen
â€“ Progress bar around the button play/pause in list

flat.short_description: Paid theme for Stellio Player in the Flat Style
flat.full_description: The theme is based on idea of a transparency â€” commonly player uses conjunction of black and white with different opacity. An innovation in the interface â€” rounded progress line. Volume control is on main screen for maximum usability.

redline.short_description: Premium theme in dark tones for Stellio Player Available only for licensed version
redline.full_description:
New list animation "Redline Scale"
Elegant design geometry
Dark color palette for a comfortable eyes perception

jfrost.full_description:
Elegant interface
Waveform progress bar on the main screen

classic.short_description: One of the best themes with real Waveform progress bar on the main screen
classic.full_description: First on one of the best dark themes. Progress bar on the main screen is made in form of a Waveform. Which is very convenient for orientation in a track, you can see: intro, hook, verse, etc.

material.short_description: Theme in the style of Android Lollipop OS (Android 5.0) from Google

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Here we collected the most popular questions and answers

items.question: What to do if I forgot/lost an activation code?
items.answer: Write us on stellio.play@gmail.com from an email, where you purchased the player. We will restore the code and send it to you.

items.question: How to pay, if I don't have a card? â€” Purchase outside of Google Play
items.answer: Buy an activation code on our site on enter it in the player. There're a lot of supported payment methods: Bank cards, QIWI, MTS, Megafon, WebMoney, Yandex.Money and much more.

items.question: å¦‚ä½•åœ¨æˆ‘çš„å…¶ä»–è®¾å¤‡ä¸Šæ¿€æ´» Stellio Premiumï¼Ÿ
items.answer:
If you bought via in-app Google Play:
1. Log in Google Play account, where you have made the purchase.
2. Open the player. License will be checked automatically.

If you have purchased an activation code:
1. Settings â€” About â€” Bind code.
2. Open player on another device and at the bottom of purchase page click "Enter code" â€” "Have bound code?" â€” Choose right option.

* Does not work with a code from AppOfTheDay

items.question: I can't find purchased app Stellio Unlocker or paid themes on Google Play
items.answer:
Unfortunately, our old Google Play account was blocked with all apps.

Log in Google using the same account you made the purchase from, download and install necessary apk, everything should work:

1. Stellio Unloker.apk - activates Stellio Premium (If you've purchased Unlocker)
2. Stellio In-App Unloker.apk - activates Stellio Premium (If you've made in app purchase)
3. Stellio ExoBlur.apk - activates ExoBlur Theme
4. Stellio TheGrand.apk - activates TheGrand Theme
- In order to install the theme open Main menu -> Bin icon
- Stellio Premium will be activated automatically

If not, write us with email of the purchase or a cheque on stellio.play@gmail.com, we will give you an activation code.

Sorry for the inconvenience :(

items.question: The player does not accept Google Play license
items.answer:
1. Ensure you logged in google play account, where you did purchase player (Settings â€” Accounts)
2. Ensure you have internet connection

* LuckyPatcher and similar applications can prevent right checking of license

items.question: æ— æ³•åœ¨æ–°è®¾å¤‡ / ROM ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨ä»£ç æ¿€æ´»æ’­æ”¾å™¨
items.answer:
If you bound code before, then at the bottom of purchase page click "Enter code" â€” "Have bound code?" â€” pick right option.
If not â€” update the code on the site and enter it again in the player.

items.question: å¦‚ä½•åœ¨ Stellio ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹å‡è¡¡å™¨ï¼Ÿ
items.answer:
1. Disable the equalizer in Stellio â€” Equalizer=>Menu=>Disable
2. If it does not help â€” kill and open Stellio or reboot the phone

* Enable compatible mode if you use ViPER4Android (ViperFX)

items.question: Music skips, hiccups, stutters
items.answer:
Audio skipping is a complex issue, it can be generated by many factors:

- SD card issues (try to play same file in stock player, if it happens there as well â€” that's it). Can happen also if many songs/images/movies recently uploaded to the phone (stock system scanner one some devices is slow and takes a lot of SD card bandwidth)

- Bluetooth issues. This usually affects any player on the device. Try to Unpair, then Pair BT device again

- HTC Sense 4.0+Beats ROMs produces skips. Try to disable beats for Stellio

- additional 3rd party audio effects. Try to temporarily disable additional audio effects and check if it helps

- some cpu hungry apps (free app like OSMonitor can show total and per process cpu consumption and find offending app/service)

- some broken formats (if skipping happens for the same songs, always, and doesn't happen for others)

You can increase audio buffer in order to prevent stuttering via Settings => Audio => Audio buffer size

items.question: é”å±æ—¶éŸ³ä¹åœæ­¢
items.answer:
Check:
- If your device has "White list of apps" then try to add the player there.
- Check permission for background activity.
- Try to disable player's equalizer (Equalizer â€” Context menu Three dots at the right top corner â€” Disable).

items.question: How to move cache on a sdcard?
items.answer:
1. Move your cache to the folder you need using a file manager
2. Change path to the folder with cache in the player: Settings â€” VKontakte â€” Folder for cached tracks
3. Settings â€” VKontakte â€” Import cache

items.question: Why I am online from a computer when I use Stellio?
items.answer:
Unfortunately, since there's no official API for music from VKontakte, we use "not standard" methods, side effect of which is online.

If you still want to be offline, try to avoid: My music, Friend's and Group's audios and Recommendations.

items.question: Why there's a cover on the main screen, but not in the list?
items.answer:
We get data from desktop version of the site VK, where there're no covers in high resolution. Small covers in the list are still useful.

If you will find big covers on the site â€” please let us know :)

page.stellioNotInstall:
If you have clicked on the button and nothing happened, then the most probably
that you don't have installed Stellio Player.

Download and after the links will work

instructions.step2: At the bottom of the page click "Enter code".
instructions.step3: Ensure that there's internet connection. Enter the code and click check. Now you are owner of Stellio Premium.
instructions.step4: In the main menu click on icon of a basket.
instructions.step5: In Stellio Store find purchased theme and click "Buy".
instructions.step6: Ensure that there's internet connection. Enter the code and click check. Enjoy new theme for Stellio.
instructions.step7: On the purchase page, select "Click to learn more".
instructions.step8: Ensure that there's internet connection. Enter the code and click check. Enjoy all the features Stellio.
instructions.step10: At the bottom of the widget page click "Enter code".
instructions.step11: Ensure that there's internet connection. Enter the code and click check. Enjoy the new pack.
instructions.step12: On the main screen, click the button "Buy All Inclusive".
instructions.step13: Ensure that there's internet connection. Enter the code and click check. Enjoy all the features of Widgets.

upd_key.title: Update an activation code
upd_key.description:
Update of code with unbind it from the device to which it is bound.
It means that after the update you will be able to activate the code on a new device.

give_code.description:
Welcome our dear user ğŸ˜
Yes, we know that you have purchased smth. Thank you so much for it.

Unfortunately recently Stellio Player was deleted from Google Play and we had to re-upload the player as a new app. It means that in new version we can't check your in-app purchases of premium, themes.

Click the button "Get codes" - and we will generate activation code for new version of Stellio which you can download using the link below. If you have desire, you can install new version and buy everything again (not necessarily), we set minimum possible prices
give_code.downloadNew: Download new version of Stellio Player
give_code.yourMail: Enter your email, we will also send codes there

donate.title: Support Developer
donate.description:
Supporting us financially, you help the project in the future development

In the comments section of the payment you can write address of your web site, name or nickname. It will be displayed in the desk of donations below.

Our dear users, we at Stellio Team are very thankful for your support. Whatever you did for us: publication on your site or donation - we are super thankful for it.

hiRes.title: Musical perfection
hiRes.description:
High resolution audio allows to hear smallest
details and nuances in music. Feel track exactly
how their creators wanted you to.
hiRes.flacVSmp3Desc:
MP3 â€” is good for its time, but technologies develop, new audio formats are created. For sure you like hd quality on Youtube, why not to request the same from music? You deserve Lossless and HD audio.

Because of new technologies a lot of devices can easily handle playback of such formats.

Download and try Stellio FLAC demo-track:
hiRes.howWorks: What is Lossless and how does it work?
hiRes.losslessDesc1:
Everything begins from a studio where original audio is created. It is pure, original WAV or AIFF, right from the source and ready to destribution.

Musicians, producers and engineers spent a lot of time and effort, using expensive tools in order to create high quality music.

Unline audio formats which compress with losses (MP3, AAC, WMA, Ogg Vorbis, Opus), FLAC, as well as any other Lossless, doesn't delete any audio data. When yoy play this file, quality is only restricted by your device. But such files take a lot of space. A minute of such quality usually takes 10 MB.
hiRes.losslessDesc2:
Exactly here happens compression of audio. This is where Â«magicÂ» helps to save quality.

Complex compression methods are used in Lossless formats, in order to decrease file size in the process.
hiRes.losslessDesc3Title: More than 2x compression with the same quality.
hiRes.losslessDesc3: Because of lossless you get the same sound, which was created originally, right in your headphones! There're no losses for increasing quality.
hiRes.popularFormats: Popular HD audio formats of files

audioFormatsBox.flac:
Free Lossless Audio Codec â€” audio format which is similar to MP3, but has
an advantage which is compression without losses. Which means that
the file has original quality.
audioFormatsBox.alac:
Apple Lossless (also known as Apple Lossless Encoder, ALE, or Apple
Lossless Audio Codec, ALAC) â€” open audio codec for compression without
loss of quality, developed by Apple.
audioFormatsBox.dsd:
Direct Stream Digital â€” one bit audio format, developed by companies
Sony and Philips, which uses encoding of density-pulse modulation
and is used to store audio on optical storage
audioFormatsBox.pcm:
Pulse Code Modulation. Is used for
digitization of analog signals. Almost all kinds of analog data
(video, audio), is standard
for cd and computers
.
audioFormatsBox.wav:
Waveform Audio File Format â€” standard for Windows based systems
and is compatible with a lot of apps. WAV is not compressed
and thus without losses.
audioFormatsBox.aiff:
Audio Interchange File Format â€” standard for audio on
Mac computers. AIFF â€” is without compression (there's also with variant) and
without losses.

hiRes.downloadTxt:
Enjoy uncompromising sound quality from your pocket.
Stellio is a perfect app for Android. Sound quality can't
be described by words, so it is time to open the player
for yourself and enjoy musical power of Hi-Res quality:

widgets.pageTitle: Audio Widget Packs â€” for Stellio, Spotify, Poweramp and etc.
widgets.title: Audio Widgets
widgets.shortDescription:
Marvelous widgets for your player ğŸ”¥
They are compatible with Stellio, Spotify, Poweramp and others
widgets.purchasesDesc:
Not every player has nice and functional widgets. But now it is not a problem. Every widget pack was crafted by hands of our designers. Also we pick wallpapers for every widget pack, which are available to download and installation on your home screen.

Pick what you like:

buy.title: Buy All Inclusive
buy.description:
Get access to all widgets instantly, also this works for all future paid widget packs.
{buy_button}

items.question: Widget says "No data". When I click on a widgets, nothing happens
items.answer:
The player should translate metadata for correct work of widgets. Currently Stelio Player, Poweramp have the best integration.

If you use Stellio - update it to the last version, and ensure that you didn't turn off Translate song metadata preference. Also you should select Stellio in Widgets app.

items.question: How to change size of elements?
items.answer: We don't have it for now. We are planning to add: Increase size of elements, Transparent background and more widgets.

items.question: How to use widgets with multiple players at the same time?
items.answer: We don't have this ability for now

items.question: How to turn off the notification?
items.answer: Unfortunately android requires notification to run background service.

items.question: Why I can't change time on progress bar?
items.answer: Unfortunately android doesn't have this capabilities for widgets. If you find a widget that can do that - let us know
